Author: scaredyk4t
Text: People are so fucking stupid and ignorant. This has been happing to me a lot lately. My fucking boss has made comments about my weight loss infront of coworkers, my old coworker said I need to put on weight after not seeing me for a few months. Like what the hell. Leave me the hell alone you don’t know what’s going on.

Author: melly_the_elephant
Text: Next time literally just say what's on your mind. People need to keep their nose out and if you educate her on it she's less likely to do that to you again or anyone else.  Maybe even find her later or tomorrow and say something. It's tough to be honest but it sounds like you're trying to do better for you and you don't need shit like that to get in your way.
